ygData.subject: Re: Ding ding!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tohlong lah at high lvls, only plate wearing goons with the 3 evading skill can tank. Monk, rouge, ranger and bards all cannot tank past then. Only job for
ygData.messageBody:
Tohlong lah at high lvls, only plate wearing goons with the 3 evading skill can
tank. Monk, rouge, ranger and bards all cannot tank past then. Only job for
monks is to do huge ammount of damage with their fist, and let the tanks taunt
the mob away from them.

The day monks can tank past 35, is the day my enchanter stop meleeing mobs with
my skull staff :)

Sabella Anna Estasis, tank mage of EQ.

Alex wrote:

> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> LOL,
>
> U guys still dont get IT into your thick head.
> There R only 2 TRUE tankies .
> Me and Yutaku.PERIOD.
>
> Yiyang
> Monk, Tank and all things Good.
>
